txt_en: Have a childlike innocence in life, and your days will always be accompanied by happiness.
txt_cn: 生活中拥有童心，你的日子将时时与快乐相伴。

txt_en: After all the difficult times, you will embrace a bright future.
txt_cn: 熬过所有的艰难时刻，你将前程似锦。

txt_en: After drinking realgar wine, all diseases are far away.
txt_cn: 喝了雄黄酒，百病远远丢。

txt_en: All your efforts will be paid off one day.
txt_cn: 你所有的努力终会有所回报。

txt_en: The road is tortuous, but the future is bright.
txt_cn: 前路虽有崎岖坎坷，未来却会光明万丈。

txt_en: The day is short but the work is much.
